channel.title: FreeStyle GunZ
channel.description:
[Website]
[b]Homepage: [url=http://www.fgunz.net]www.fgunz.net[/url][/b] Registration: [url=http://fgunz.net/register]http://fgunz.net/register[/url] V E R S I O N 7
After years of developing, we are proud to present to you the best GunZ Client ever created, making this the absolutely best GunZ Server alive.
Nearly 2000 Items | 55 Amazing Maps | GunZ 1.5 | Custom Roomtags & Commands | 20x Exp | Highly Customized | Anti-Hack | Highspeed Dedicated Server | 24/7 Online | Anti-Lead + Lead | Quest, Survival, ClanWar, Duel Tournament | Rebirth System | Custom Runnable, Client, Launcher | Balanced Freestyle System |
Want to know more? See the trailer! Freestyle GunZ | Trailer
Created in early 2007, with 6 years of experience, Freestyle GunZ offers you the best GunZ Online experience. If you did not get to play this awesome server yet, you should do now!
Players Online: [img]https://forum.ragezone.com/cache.php?img=http%3A%2F%2Fstatus.fgunz.net[/img]
[Server]
• Dedicated HighSpeed Gaming Server • 1 Gbps Uplink - extremely fast! Lag-free! Always Online! • Located in the Netherlands, Europe • DDoS protected • Launcher uses a CDN so updates are downloaded in no-time!
[Experience/Bounty Rates]
• Experience x20, means 20 times higher EXP rate than Ijji! • Infinite Bounty / All items for 0 Bounty!
[Features]
• Almost 2000 Items • Custom game-modes: Infected, Gun Game • Hundreds of custom 3D Models, Weapons, Sets and Items! • 55 professional, unique Maps - all with Lightmap-Support! • Daggers, Swords, Large Swords, Snowboards, Pistols, Revolvers, SMGs, UZIs, HotShots, Shotguns, Rocketlaunchers, Snipers (with ZOOM!), Rifles, Big Machine Guns, Landmines, Custom Grenades and Explosions and GunZ 1.5 items - A lot of stuff to discover! • Custom Quests, ClanWars, Duel Tournament, etc. • Custom MusicPlayer, Custom 1337 Options, Custom Commands, Custom GameModes • Up to 64 Players per Room, 500 Rounds, Infinite Time! • Custom Colors, GFX and unique Interface • Amazing Anti-Hack engine (NO hackers!) • Rebirth System - Level 99 is not the end! • Cheap Donation Items, get F-Coins for free! • Professional & Active Staff, Moderators and Developers • Daily Events, multiple Events per day! • Custom scoreboard!
[Community]
• Worlds best Community! • More than 10.000 Members, 900+ active Users! • More than 550.000 Posts, 50.000+ threads! • More than 750 Pages of real Player Pictures!
[Screenshots]
Login [img]https://forum.ragezone.com/cache.php?img=http%3A%2F%2Fi.imgur.com%2Fs8FzcKs.jpg[/img]
Lobby [img]https://forum.ragezone.com/cache.php?img=http%3A%2F%2Fi.imgur.com%2FtlJQ49D.jpg[/img]
Scoreboard
[img]https://forum.ragezone.com/cache.php?img=http%3A%2F%2Fi.imgur.com%2FfoMMwHc.jpg[/img]
[img]https://forum.ragezone.com/cache.php?img=http%3A%2F%2Fi.imgur.com%2FWH5wgks.jpg[/img]
JOIN NOW!! FreeStyleGunZ !!! JOIN!!

item.description:
@disciple wrote:

[Website]

Homepage: www.fgunz.net
Registration: http://fgunz.net/register
V E R S I O N 7

After years of developing, we are proud to present to you the best GunZ Client ever created, making this the absolutely best GunZ Server alive.

Nearly 2000 Items | 55 Amazing Maps | GunZ 1.5 | Custom Roomtags & Commands | 20x Exp | Highly Customized | Anti-Hack | Highspeed Dedicated Server | 24/7 Online | Anti-Lead + Lead | Quest, Survival, ClanWar, Duel Tournament | Rebirth System | Custom Runnable, Client, Launcher | Balanced Freestyle System |

Want to know more? See the trailer!
Freestyle GunZ | Trailer

Created in early 2007, with 6 years of experience, Freestyle GunZ offers you the best GunZ Online experience.
If you did not get to play this awesome server yet, you should do now!

Players Online:

[Server]

• Dedicated HighSpeed Gaming Server
• 1 Gbps Uplink - extremely fast! Lag-free! Always Online!
• Located in the Netherlands, Europe
• DDoS protected
• Launcher uses a CDN so updates are downloaded in no-time!

[Experience/Bounty Rates]

• Experience x20, means 20 times higher EXP rate than Ijji!
• Infinite Bounty / All items for 0 Bounty!

[Features]

• Almost 2000 Items
• Custom game-modes: Infected, Gun Game
• Hundreds of custom 3D Models, Weapons, Sets and Items!
• 55 professional, unique Maps - all with Lightmap-Support!
• Daggers, Swords, Large Swords, Snowboards, Pistols, Revolvers, SMGs, UZIs, HotShots, Shotguns, Rocketlaunchers, Snipers (with ZOOM!), Rifles, Big Machine Guns, Landmines, Custom Grenades and Explosions and GunZ 1.5 items - A lot of stuff to discover!
• Custom Quests, ClanWars, Duel Tournament, etc.
• Custom MusicPlayer, Custom 1337 Options, Custom Commands, Custom GameModes
• Up to 64 Players per Room, 500 Rounds, Infinite Time!
• Custom Colors, GFX and unique Interface
• Amazing Anti-Hack engine (NO hackers!)
• Rebirth System - Level 99 is not the end!
• Cheap Donation Items, get F-Coins for free!
• Professional & Active Staff, Moderators and Developers
• Daily Events, multiple Events per day!
• Custom scoreboard!

[Community]

• Worlds best Community!
• More than 10.000 Members, 900+ active Users!
• More than 550.000 Posts, 50.000+ threads!
• More than 750 Pages of real Player Pictures!
